| History                 = The '''United States Armed Forces''' are the combined military might of the [[United States of America]], including the [[United States Army (Earth-616)|U.S. Army]], [[United States Navy (Earth-616)|U.S. Navy]], [[United States Air Force (Earth-616)|U.S. Air Force]], and [[United States Marine Corps (Earth-616)|U.S. Marine Corps]], under the command of the [[Presidents of the United States of America|President of the United States of America]] via the Joint Chiefs of Staff at the [[United States Department of Defense (Earth-616)|U.S. Department of Defense]], as well as the [[United States Coast Guard (Earth-616)|U.S. Coast Guard]] under direct operational control of the [[United States Department of Homeland Security (Earth-616)|U.S. Department of Homeland Security]].
